GENERAL.WELCOME: Welcome to The Punctual app! Please read our terms of use and privacy policy.
GENERAL.BEFORE_START: Hello! Don't forget to clock in when you start work
GENERAL.BEFORE_PAUSE: Hello! Don't forget to clock out for lunch
GENERAL.BEFORE_RETURN: Hello! Don't forget to clock in after lunch
GENERAL.BEFORE_END: Hello! Don't forget to clock out when you finish work
GENERAL.AFTER_START: ATTENTION! Don't forget to clock in when you return to work
GENERAL.AFTER_PAUSE: ATTENTION! Don't forget to clock out for lunch
GENERAL.AFTER_RETURN: ATTENTION! Don't forget to clock in after lunch
GENERAL.AFTER_END: ATTENTION! Don't forget to clock out when you finish work
GENERAL.ABNORMAL_ON: Please, explain the reason for your clock-in
GENERAL.ABNORMAL_OFF: Please, explain the reason for your clock-out
GENERAL.WARNING_AFTER: ATTENTION - Overtime! Please clock your hours!
